summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on August 25, 2010. The email is brief and requests a call, while also indicating that the information contained is confidential and may be privileged. The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a desire to communicate with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, to whom Epstein is requesting a call.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley for a personal communication, indicating a relationship that allows for direct contact.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is requesting a call from Jes Staley.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
